rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0001
rows.name: [ST:wide ]―External input detected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0002
rows.name: Disengaging sleep mode in 10 seconds...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0003
rows.name: Seven... six... five... four... three... two... one...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0004
rows.name: [ST:wide ]―Opening hatch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0005
rows.name:
[ST:wide ]―Oh, good.
So there was another survivor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0006
rows.name: Are you okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Don't push yourself too hard.
You only just woke up, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0008
rows.name: Yours was the only pod that came down around here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Glad I found you.
My name's Elma. What's yours?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0011
rows.name:
You don't know your own name?
Maybe it's amnesia...[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0012
rows.name:
That's a problem...
Can you really not remember anything at all?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Nice name.
What else do you remember?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0014
rows.name: I see...[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0014_2
rows.name:
I'll fill you in on your situation
little by little.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0015
rows.name: How are you feeling? Think you can move?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod.

rows.label: xs00040100_SEL0011
rows.name: Nod and smile.

rows.label: xs00040100_JNK0020
rows.name: Silent contemplation.

rows.label: xs00040100_SEL0021
rows.name: Look down, considering how you feel.

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Don't push yourself, you just woke up.
We'll take it slow, okay? Let's go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0017
rows.name: For now, I'll hand over some equipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0019
rows.name: First off, let's get out of this canyon.[ST:wait ]
